## Bio
Diqin is a PhD student in Experimental and Clinical Pharmacology under the guidance of Dr. Cheng. She earned her Master's and Bachelor's degrees in
Clinical Pharmacy from Peking University and Sichuan University, respectively. Her research interest focuses on mechanistic pharmacokinetic-pharmacodynamic (PK-PD) modeling and simulation to advance model-informed precise dosing in clinical drug use.
